name: Void0
description:
Made for Ludum Dare #32 - "An Unconventional Weapon".

Void0 is a simple game where you start out as a small blob, and you must absorb other blobs to get larger. The blobs you can absorb are determined by your level. You can absorb blobs at your level or lower to grow in size. The game ends when you try to absorb a blob that's higher than your level.

CONTROLS:
Arrow/Cursor keys to move around.
